languages.text: "Ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе нуждался, и теперь все, кого ты знала, мертвы. На что еще ты рассчитывала?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе нуждался, и теперь все, кого ты знала, мертвы. На что еще ты рассчитиывала?"

languages.text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"
languages.original_text: "Ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе нуждался, и теперь все, кого ты знала, мертвы. На что еще ты рассчитывала?"

traits.locale_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"
"You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"
"You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"
"You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"
"You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

languages.text: «Abandonaste Crudarach cuando más te necesitaban, y ahora todos los que conocías han muerto. ¿Qué creías que iba a ocurrir?».
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: «Abandonaste Crudarach cuando más te necesitaban, y ahora todos los que conocías han muerto. ¿Qué creías que iba a ocurrir?».

languages.text: 「クルダラがお前を必要としていた時、お前はやつを見捨てたんだ。そして今、お前が知る者はみんな死んだ。どうなると思っていたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラがお前を必要としていた時、お前はやつを見捨てたんだ。そして今、お前が知る者はみんな死んだ。どうなると思っていたんだ？」

languages.text: “克鲁达拉赫需要你的时候，你却抛弃了它，于是你认识的所有人都死了。你当时做出这个选择的时候，难道没想过这样的后果吗？”
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: “克鲁达拉赫需要你的时候，你却抛弃了它，于是你认识的所有人都死了。你当时做出这个选择的时候，难道没想过这样的后果吗？”

languages.text: « Vous avez abandonné Crudarach au moment où votre monde avait besoin de vous, et maintenant tous vos semblables sont morts. Que pensiez-vous qu'il se passerait ? »
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez abandonné Crudarach au moment où votre monde avait besoin de vous, et maintenant tous vos semblables sont morts. Que pensiez-vous qu'il se passerait ? »

languages.text: "Ihr ließt Crudarach zurück, als Ihr gebraucht wurdet, und jetzt sind alle tot, die Ihr kennt. Was habt Ihr denn geglaubt, was passieren würde?"
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ließt Crudarach zurück, als Ihr gebraucht wurdet, und jetzt sind alle tot, die Ihr kennt. Was habt Ihr denn geglaubt, was passieren würde?"

languages.text: "En zor gününde Crudarach'ı terk ettin. Tanıdığın herkes öldü gitti. Ne olacağını sanıyordun?"
languages.original_text: "You abandoned Crudarach when it needed you, and now everyone you know is dead. What did you think was going to happen?"

traits.locale_text: "Sana ihtiyaç varken Crudarach'ı terk ettin. Şimdiyse tanıdığın kimse hayatta değil. Ne olacağını sanmıştın?"
